name: Crowd Control (itch) (ThePixelStar)
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

This is the first game I made I also made it for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam Out of Control in 48 hours. 

You use WASD to move and Left Click to Shoot. It is a top-down shooter. It fits the theme out of control since it is a riot and when you get hit by Tear Gas your controls change.

Get to the police station and break it to win the level!
